name: Ya2d
tagline: Yet nother 2D framework for unity game engine.
body:
### Welcome to YA2D framework.
YA2D is a framework for rapid developing 2 dimensional games in unity, it allows you to create and manipulate 2d game objects such as camera in one click.


### developing guide.
fork repository and ask me to update main code.

### Authors and Contributors
Arash Rasoulzadeh (@darkeliden) [arashrasoulzadeh(at)gmail(dot)com]
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
